GSP28prakp06u:10: svarūpasaṃkhyārthaphaleṣu vādibhiḥ yato vivādā bahudhā vitenire /
GSP28prakp06u:12: kiṃ punaridaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāma ? na tāvadavisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:14: atha smṛtirvikalparūpatayā paramārthasat svalakṣaṇamagṛhṇāntī saṃvṛtisantamākāramavastubhūtamullikhantī dvicandrādibodhavannāvisaṃvādinīti matam /
GSP28prakp06u:22: kiñca yadyanumānaṃ vikalparūpatayā svalakṣaṇaṃ na gṛhṇāti, kathaṃ tarhyadhyavasyatyapi /
GSP28prakp06u:24: yo hyākāro na gṛhyate sa kathamadhyavasīyetāpi /
GSP28prakp06u:25: pratītiviruddhaṃ cedamucyate “smṛtiranumānavad bāhyaṃ vastu na viṣayīkurute” iti /
GSP28prakp06u:30: pravṛtto 'pi yadi tathābhūtameva pratilabhate; tadā tadavisaṃvādijñānaṃ pramāṇamucyate /
GSP28prakp06u:32: avisaṃvādanaṃ .......[pra. vā. pari. 1-ślo. 3.]” iti tathā---“na108 hyābhyāmarthaṃ paricchidya pravarttamānor'thakriyāyāṃ visaṃvādyata” iti ca /
GSP28prakp06u:34: atha mataṃ smṛtvār'tha pravartamāno niyamenār'tha na pratilabhate iti /
GSP28prakp06u:49: yadi manvīta satyāmapi prāptiyogyatāyāṃ smṛteryat tayā prāpayitavyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ,
GSP28prakp06u:57: arthapratibaddhatā hi prāpakatā, sā ca jñānāntarasyāpi nānupapannā /
GSP28prakp06u:58: yadyucyeta na prāpakatāmatreṇa prāmāṇyam, api tu pravartakatayāpi /
GSP28prakp06u:59: tathā sati yat prāpayatipravartayati, ca tat pramāṇamiti /
GSP28prakp06u:64: pravartakatve ca pramāṇalakṣaṇā nupraveśini nirvikalpakajñānānāmapramāṇatā syāt,
GSP28prakp06u:66: tadutthāstu vikalpā eva prāpakatayā pravartakatayā ca pramāṇabhūtāḥ syuḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:67: dhārāvāhikajñāneṣu ca pūrvajñānaviṣayārthatvāduttareṣāṃ pramititvaṃ na syāt /
GSP28prakp06u:84: sādhāraṇadharmadarśanādekatra anekadharmāvagamādvādināmadhyavasīyamānaviśeṣāṇāṃ vipratipatteścānadhyavasitaviśeṣe vastunyaniyataviśeṣaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ 113saṃśaya iti tārkikāḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:85: yathā santamasatirohitaviśeṣe vastunyūrdhvatāmātradarśanena kimayaṃ sthāṇuruta puruṣa iti /
GSP28prakp06u:88: kecinnityaṃ śabdamāhuḥ, kecidanityaṃ iti vādināṃ vivādāt jijñāsostattve saṃśayo bhavati iti /
GSP28prakp06u:90: yau hi dharmau saṃśayyete, tayorekamidaṃ jñānaṃ nodīyate, kintu dbe ete vijñāne viśeṣaṇasmaraṇe /
GSP28prakp06u:91: tayośca viśeṣaṇayorekasyāpi tasmin dharmiṇi niścayo nāstītyekāntato vyavahāraṃ pratipattā pravartayitumaśaknuvan saṃśeta iva bhavatīti,
GSP28prakp06u:93: ye ca smaraṇe tayorgṛhītagrāhitayaiva prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti kiṃ dṛggrahaṇena /
GSP28prakp06u:95: nanu śuktikāyāṃ rajatamidamiti jñānaṃ, pratibimbajñānaṃ ca vyabhicāri dṛśyate /
GSP28prakp06u:97: yadi rajatajñānaṃ rajataviṣayaṃ na syāt, tato vyabhicaratyartham /
GSP28prakp06u:98: rajataviṣayatve tu ko vyabhicāraḥ? nanu nedaṃ jñānaṃ rajataviṣayam, kintu śuktikāviṣayameva /
GSP28prakp06u:100: śuktikāviṣayamityasya ko 'rthaḥ ? kiṃ yāsau śuktikāvyaktistāmeva viṣayīkaroti ? uta śuktikātvameva /
GSP28prakp06u:103: na ca samīcīnarajavyaktirapi na rajatatvabuddhyā gocarībhavati, kiṃ punaḥ śuktikā vyaktiḥ ?
GSP28prakp06u:109: tacca purovartini na sambhavatīti tadviṣayiṇī smṛtireveyaṃ kuto 'syā vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:111: bhāsvare hi darpaṇādau nayanaraśmirnipatitaḥ pratihataḥ parāvṛtto mukhādinā saṃyuktastadeva mukhādi gṛhṇāti /
GSP28prakp06u:115: mukhāderdeśo na gṛhyate darpaṇādīnāṃ tvagrahaṇamiti mukhādayastaddeśā iva bhānti /
GSP28prakp06u:116: abhimukhena mukhādinā nayanaraśmiḥ saṃyukta iti tathaiva tadavagamāt savyadakṣiṇaviparyāso yukta eva /
GSP28prakp06u:117: alpatvamahattve ca darpaṇāde raśmipratighātahetoralpatayā mahattayā ca doṣabhūtayā mukhādiparimāṇāgrahaṇāddarpaṇādiparimāṇagrahaṇācca mukhādiṣvavabhāsete /
GSP28prakp06u:119: evamādi ca nayavīthyāṃ nipuṇataramupapāditamityanayaiva diśā sarvatra115 vyabhicāro varjanīya iti nedamapi pramāṇalakṣaṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:123: na ca smṛteḥ prāmāṇyāpattiriti darśayati---“sā smṛteranyā” iti atha kā smṛtiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:130: smṛtirhi tadityupajāyamānāṃ prācīṃ pratītimanuruddhyamānāṃ na svātantryeṇārthaṃ paricchinattīti na pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:135: dhārāvāhikavijñāneṣu tarhyuttaravijñānāni smṛtipramoṣādaviśiṣṭāni kathaṃ pramāṇāni ityatrāha---“anyonyanirapekṣāstu dhārāvāhikabuddhayaḥ” /
GSP28prakp06u:136: vyāpriyamāṇe hi pūrvavijñānakāraṇakalāpe uttareṣāmapyutpattiriti na utpattitaḥ pratītito vā dhārāvāhikavijñānāni parasparasyātiśerata iti yuktā sarveṣāmapi pramāṇatā /
GSP28prakp06u:137: yadyanubhūtimātraṃ pramāṇaṃ, tato rajatamidamiti yad bhrāntivijñānaṃ, tadapi pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp06u:139: rajatamidamiti nedamekaṃ vijñānam, kintu dve ete vijñāne grahaṇasmaraṇarūpe /
GSP28prakp06u:144: te 'pi bādhakapratyayādhīnaṃ mithyātvamabhyupagacchanto nedamaṃśasya mithyābhāvaṃ vaditumīśate,
GSP28prakp06u:149: tatra hi pītimā śaṅkhasvarūpañca dvayamanubhūyata eva /
GSP28prakp06u:150: nayanagatapittadravyavarttī hi pītimāpyanubhūyata eveti nayavīthyāṃ nipuṇataramupapāditam /
GSP28prakp06u:153: ko nāma pītaśaṅkhajñānamapramāṇamāha, pramāṇameva hi tad, yathārthaviṣayatvāt /
GSP28prakp06u:156: yatra tu vyavahāravisamvādo nāsti, tatra bhrāntirapi na vyapadiśyate /
GSP28prakp06u:162: gatvarā hi tatra tejo 'vayavāḥ sañcāritāsteṣvanyatra gateṣvaparatejo 'vayavasañcaraṇavicchede yuktaivāpākajatve pākāntarānapekṣā auṣṇyasya nivṛttiriti,
GSP28prakp06u:165: yastu viparītakhyātivādī uṣṇajalajñānamapramāṇaṃ bhrāntañcāha, tasya sarvalokavirodhaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:169: kāḥ punastā vidhā ityatrāha--- śāstraṃ tathopamānārthāpattī iti gurormatam” /
GSP28prakp06u:174: tatra sa ca sannikarṣaḥ ṣoḍhā bhidyate---saṃyogaḥ,
GSP28prakp06u:180: tatra saṃyogāt pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:184: te ca pṛthvagrā iti pṛthūnyapi dravyāṇi 121prāpnuvanti /
GSP28prakp06u:185: nanvevaṃ dūre artha iti sāntarālagrahaṇaṃ na syāt,
GSP28prakp06u:187: kiñca saṃyogasya gatinibandhanatvād gatimatāṃ ca krameṇāsannadūragamanāt samakālamāseduṣāṃ davīyasāṃ cārthānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
GSP28prakp06u:190: sakalānarthānprāpyayugapadupasthitena bāhyena tejasā sahaikībhūtāste cākṣuṣā raśmayo yugapadgrahaṇahetava iti /
GSP28prakp06u:194: atisannikṛṣṭeṣu vastuṣu gatikālabhedaḥ padmapatraśatabhedavat mā nāma avasāyi /
GSP28prakp06u:195: 124anekayojanasahastrāntariteṣu bhūmiṣṭheṣvartheṣu dhruve ca sadaiva kālabhedānavasāyo na buddhimanurañjayati /
GSP28prakp06u:197: nayanaraśmibhirekībhūte 'pi bāhye tejasi yāvāneva tasya bhāgo 'dṛṣṭavaśenopalabdhihetutayopāttaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:198: tāvānevopalabdhaye prabhavati, na sarva iti, na sarvopalambho yugapat bhaumadhruvādisiddhiśca /
GSP28prakp06u:199: nanu prāpyakāriṇi nāyane tejasi kācābhrapaṭalatimirāntariteṣu kathamupalabdhiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:203: prāpya grahaṇe tu tejovayavānāmapracuratayā yuktamasphuṭadarśanaṃ davīyasām, kṣodiṣṭhānāmadarśanam /
GSP28prakp06u:204: atha kasmādaṇu pārthivādi ākāśakāladigātmānaśca na pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyante /
GSP28prakp06u:213: karṇaśaṣkuloparicchinnagaganameva śrotram, tadguṇaśśabda iti tattvāloke nipuṇataramuktam /
GSP28prakp06u:223: yadā hi taijasamuṣṇatvaṃ jalagatañca śītatvaṃ vāyoścānuṣṇāśītatvaṃ sparśanena vāyau vāti sati pratīyate,
GSP28prakp06u:229: etacca pañcikādvaye prapañcitam, atrāpi cānumānaparicchede vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:233: anyacca samavāyaviśeṣaṇatā nāma sannikarṣāntaraṃ kimiti neṣyate /
GSP28prakp06u:234: yathā goraśvasya cānyonyābhāvapratītaye saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatā nāma sannikarṣāntaramāśrīyate134;
GSP28prakp06u:236: tasmārttividha eva sannikarṣaḥ pratyakṣahetuḥ---saṃyogaḥ, saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ, samavāyaśceti /
GSP28prakp06u:238: yadā hi---rūpaṃ rūpamiti 137jānāti rasaṃ rasa iti jānāti tadā śabdasañjalpasambhavāt śābdatāśaṅkā kasyacit syāt /
GSP28prakp06u:240: na hīndriyārthasannikarṣaje jñāne śabdasya vyāpṛtirasti, yataśśābdatā syāditi /
GSP28prakp06u:245: śabdasañjalpanānuvaddhisya pratyakṣasya śābdatvāśaṅkā śābdaparīkṣāparvaṇi nirākartumucitā 139anumānaśaṅkeva sarvasya 140śābdasya /
GSP28prakp06u:253: api cāvyabhicāritā vyavasāyātmakatā ca na pratyakṣalakṣaṇam, kintu pramāṇalakṣaṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:255: tadviśeṣasya pratyakṣasya prātisvikaṃ sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttisamarthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vācyam---'indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP28prakp06u:256: asminnapi lakṣaṇe 'numānādipramitiḥ svātmani, pramātari ca na 141pratyakṣā syādanindriyajatvāt /
GSP28prakp06u:260: tathābhūtameva taimirikādīnāṃ keśoṇḍrakādijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mā prasāṅkṣīdityuktamabhrāntamiti /
GSP28prakp06u:262: yadindriyāṇāmarthena sannikarṣādupajāyate, tadindriyajñānaṃ pañcasu rūpādiṣu pañcavidham /
GSP28prakp06u:264: sukhādayastu 144vijñānābhinnahetukatayā na tasmādbhidyanta iti te 'pi svasaṃviditā eva /
GSP28prakp06u:270: anyathā nirākārā saṃvittiḥ kathaṃ rūpādisaṃvittivyavasthāṃ labheta /
GSP28prakp06u:272: arthena sārūpyaṃ vijñānaṃ ghaṭayati nendriyādi, iti na tatpramāṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:273: nanvekasyākārasya pratītestasya ca jñāna eva 146avasthitatvātkathamarthasya pratyakṣatā /
GSP28prakp06u:274: ucyate---yor'tho jñānasyākāramātmano 'nvayavyatirekāvanukārayati, sa pratyakṣa iti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:282: pramāṇapratītamarthaṃ parokṣamapi bhāvayato yadbhāvanāyāḥ parame prakarṣe satyaparokṣāvabhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate, tatpratyakṣam /
GSP28prakp06u:289: tena tābhyāmavidyamānābhyāṃ yojayitvā jāyamānaṃ jātiguṇakalpanājñānaṃ na pratyakṣamiti /
GSP28prakp06u:292: ekasminnapi dravye dravyāntarādvyāvartamāne anuvartamānayorjātiguṇayorbhedāvagamāditi jātinirṇaye nirṇītam /
GSP28prakp06u:294: dravyakalpanā tu viṣāṇī, daṇḍīti ca na pratyakṣatāmativartate, 153indriyavyāpārānuvidhāyitvāt /
GSP28prakp06u:296: indriyavyāpārānuvidhāyitvāt1 tatra yadyapi varṇātmakaṃ nāma smaraṇaniviṣṭam;
GSP28prakp06u:299: na hi saṃjñā, tatsambandho vā tadānīmekavijñāne viśeṣaṇatvena pratibhātaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:301: saṃjñini hi dṛśyamāne prāganubhūtau tau smṛtimārohataḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:302: ata evoktam--- saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP28prakp06u:303: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //
GSP28prakp06u:304: iti ataḥ nāmayojanayā jāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ na pratyakṣamiti 155ye vadanti te 'pyanayaiva diśā nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:311: atastābhyāṃ yojayantyeva sarvā indriyapratītissamutpadyata iti nirviṣayaṃ kalpanāpogpadam /
GSP28prakp06u:327: nirākārāṇāmapi vṛttīnāṃ svabhāvata eva viśiṣṭārthasambandhitayā sphuraṇāt /
GSP28prakp06u:333: svapnādiṣvapi bāhyasyavārthasyākāraḥ smṛtauprathata iti nayavīthyāṃ sādhitam /
GSP28prakp06u:338: api ca yadi jñānānatiriktasyaiva prakāśaḥ, tadā grāhyagrāhakavittīnāṃ bhedasya kathaṃ prakāśaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:343: yaiva hi saṃvittiḥ, saiva tasyārthasyopalabdhiriti kathamasau tāṃ vinā prakāśeta /
GSP28prakp06u:355: na ca bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajasya yogijñānasya pramāṇataiva sambhavati, smṛtirūpatvāt /
GSP28prakp06u:356: pramāṇena hi bhūtabharthaṃ paricchidya yā bhāvanā, sā smṛtisantatireva /
GSP28prakp06u:357: tatprakarṣajamapi jñānaṃ smṛtiviśeṣa eveti na pramāṇam, na vā pratyakṣamityalamativistareṇa /
GSP28prakp06u:359: 164yadapi kecinmanyante “tatsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma sat pratyakṣam” [1-1-4] iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:365: prameyeṣu hi loke tadeva pratyakṣamityucyate yadviṣayaṃ jñānam,
GSP28prakp06u:366: tenaivendriyāṇāṃ samprayoge puruṣasya yad jñānaṃ jāyate /
GSP28prakp06u:367: na ca śuktikāsamprayukte cakṣuṣi yadrajatajñānaṃ jāyate tadevaṃvidhatam /
GSP28prakp06u:369: rajatajñānaṃ hi rajataviṣayam, na ca rajatenendriyaṃ samprayuktam, rajatasya tatrāsannihitatvāt /
GSP28prakp06u:371: kintarhi smaraṇaṃ tat, iti darśayituṃ sūtramidamiti varṇanīyam /
GSP28prakp06u:374: nanu bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajā smṛtirapi sākṣātkāravatī pratyakṣaṃ prasajyate /
GSP28prakp06u:377: anubhūtiḥ pramāṇam, tadviśeṣaśca pratyakṣamiti na 167smṛteḥ pratyakṣatvāpattiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:379: tatra vibhāgamāha---“meyeṣvindriyayogotthā” dravyajātiguṇeṣvindriyasaṃyogotthā sā-pratyakṣā pratītiḥ meyeṣvindriyasaṃyogena,
GSP28prakp06u:382: kāni punanindriyāṇi ? ghrāṇa-rasana-nayana-tvak-śrāvaṇāni bāhyāni, āntarañca manaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:393: pārthivaparamāṇuṣu rūpādayo 'gnisaṃyogamevāsamavāyikāraṇamāśrityotpadyamānāḥ pratītā ityātmano 'pi bodhākhyo dharmo dravyāntarasaṃyogamevāsamavāyikāraṇamāśrayate /
GSP28prakp06u:394: tasya ca dravyasyāśrayabhūtadravyāntarasadbhāve pramāṇābhāvādadravyadravyatvaṃ niścīyate1 dvividhaṃ cādravyadravyam--- paramamahadākāśādikam, paramāṇurūpañca /
GSP28prakp06u:397: yo hi saṃyogaḥ sākṣātpratīyate, so 'nyatarakarmajaḥ, ubhayakarmajaḥ, saṃyogajo vā /
GSP28prakp06u:398: tena niyatakāraṇatvena saṃyogasyāvagatatvāt, tadabhāve saṃyoga eva nāstīti niścīyate /
GSP28prakp06u:400: na vānumātuṃ śakyata iti pāriśeṣyādaṇutvameva tasya 170dravyasyāśrīyate /
GSP28prakp06u:402: tatkarmotpattau ca prayatnavadātmanaḥ saṃyoga eva kāraṇam, śarīrakarmavat /
GSP28prakp06u:405: [vai. da. a. 5. ā. 2. 13.] miti1 sukhaduḥkhechādveṣaprayatnānubhave yat,
GSP28prakp06u:409: [abhi. dha. ko. sthā.-17] iti, tadapi nirākṛtam /
GSP28prakp06u:416: tena gandhavatpārthivaṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhagrahaṇakāraṇam, rasavaccāmbhasaṃ rasanaṃ rasānubhavanimittam /
GSP28prakp06u:421: tenābhyantarāṇāṃ sukhādīnāṃ grahaṇe sannikarṣadvayaṃ kāraṇam---ātmamanassaṃyogākhyaḥ179 sannikarṣaḥ,
GSP28prakp06u:428: sparśavanmahattvayuktaṃ dravyaṃ pārthivam, āpyam, taijasam, vāyavīyañca, caturvidhamaindriyakam /
GSP28prakp06u:442: samāhitamanasko hi viṣayāntarānusandhānaśūnya indriyasaṃyuktaṃ vastu sākṣādupalabhata iti svasaṃvidevātra pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:453: paṭañca paṭākāratayā viditvāyaṃ sa na bhavatīti 189tayoritaretarābhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP28prakp06u:456: tasmātsāmānyaviśeṣau dve vastunī pratipadyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prathamamupapadyate192 /
GSP28prakp06u:464: savikalpakantu tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi ta eva vastunī sāmānyaviśeṣātmanā pratipadyate /
GSP28prakp06u:466: indriyasāmarthyasamutthañca pratyakṣamiti, kathaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣātmakaṃ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:468: ātmā tvekaḥ sarvānubhavitavyānubhavitā saṃskāravaśena vastvantaramanusandhadindriyeṇa192 sāmānyaviśeṣātmanā vastu śaknotyeva pratyetum /
GSP28prakp06u:469: tathā nirvikalpakena sāmānyaviśeṣau dve vastunī pratipadyamānenāpi tayorbhedo gṛhītuṃ na śakyate /
GSP28prakp06u:470: na hi vastubhedamātreṇa bhedabuddhiḥ193, kintu dharmāntaragraho 'pi194 bhedabuddhau sahakārī /
GSP28prakp06u:472: uttarakāle ca vastvantarānusandhānena te pratipadya bhinnatvamavasīyate /
GSP28prakp06u:473: bhede sati viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvasāya iti, na nirvikalpakadaśāyāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:475: guṇapratītāvapi nirvikalpakaṃ na viśiṣṭatayā dravyamavacchinatti, dravyaguṇayorbhedānavagamāt /
GSP28prakp06u:479: agṛhītabhedañca tat na viśiṣṭatāṃ grahītumīṣṭe iti savikalpaka eva viśiṣṭapratyayaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:483: ātmanaḥ pramātṛtvānnirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinaśca savikalpakasya gṛhītagrāhitve 'pi dhārāvāhikanyāyena 201pramāṇatvaṃ veditavyam /
GSP28prakp06u:490: samprati mātari mitau ca pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyātumāha--- “sarvavijñānahetūtthā mitau mātari ca pramā /
GSP28prakp06u:495: sarvā hi pratītirevamupajāyate 'hamidaṃ jānāmīti, na punarjānātītyevaṃ kācidbuddhirasti /
GSP28prakp06u:501: nanvevaṃ tarhi sarva pratyakṣaṃ prasaktam ? yadi mātrabhiprāyam /
GSP28prakp06u:509: tena tāsāṃ svātmani yuktameva pratyakṣatvam, pramāṇatvañca /
GSP28prakp06u:512: ucyate--- meye mātari ca vyatiriktā pratītiḥ sākṣātkāravatī, mitau tvavyatiriktā /
GSP28prakp06u:513: idamahaṃ gṛhṇāmīti vā, idamahaṃ smarāmīti vā tritayamevāvabhāsate /
GSP28prakp06u:519: jāgrato hi meyāni mātā ca prakāśante /
GSP28prakp06u:520: suṣuptasya tadā na tat dvayamapi prakāśate /
GSP28prakp06u:521: na ca tadānīṃ tad dvayamapi nāstyeva, prabodhe pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP28prakp06u:522: tatra prakāśātmakatve tu suṣuptidaśāyamāpi tat dvayaṃ prakāśeta /
GSP28prakp06u:526: kiñca svata eva yadupapadyate, na tatra parāpekṣā yuktā /
GSP28prakp06u:527: meyānāṃ mātuśca svayaṃ prakāśo na nopapadyata iti, yuktā tayoḥ parāpekṣā /
GSP28prakp06u:528: mitau ca kācidanu papattirnāstīti svayamprakāśaiva mitiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:532: 217ekaścāyamākāro 'vabhāsate, tena prakāśa eva tadākāra iti yuktam /
GSP28prakp06u:535: arthākāratve tu yasyākāro 'sau, tasyeti ghaṭate prativiṣayavyavasthā /
GSP28prakp06u:545: ye ca 220parasparaṃ vyatibhinnāvabhāsā bhāvāḥ, teṣāṃ na sahopalambhaniyamaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:547: tena bhedādaniyamavyāptāt niyamo vyāvartamāno 'bheda evāvatiṣṭhamāno 'bhedaṃ sādhayati /
GSP28prakp06u:574: kiñca yathā marīcikājalajñāne jalārthinaḥ pravṛttasyārthakriyā na sambhavati,
GSP28prakp06u:580: tathā hi---na tāvatkvacidarthasyākāravi235 - śeṣādhāyakatvaṃ sākṣādavagatam, kalpanīyantu tat /
GSP28prakp06u:581: tacca dṛṣṭe samanantarapratyaya eva varaṃ kalpyam /
GSP28prakp06u:583: tena kiñcideva jñānaṅkasyacideva kutracideva kadācideva heturiti pratiniyamasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:585: tena kiñcideva jalajñānamarthakriyājananasamarthaṃ, 237kiñcicca na ityapi pratiniyamasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:588: na ca deśāntarakālāntaravartināmeva tatra sāmarthyam, avidyamānasya sāmarthyāyogāt /
GSP28prakp06u:601: arthakriyāsamvādayogyañca jñānaṃ pramāṇam, itaracca neti pramāṇāpramāṇabhedopyupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:608: yasya ca svarūpameva nāvasitaṃ, na tena saha kasyacitsārūpyaparikalpanam /
GSP28prakp06u:609: na cāpi jñānākārodayavaśenārtho vyavasthāpyamānaḥ sarūpatayā parikalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28prakp06u:615: sādhāraṇākārā buddhiḥ, 244asādhāraṇākāraścārthaḥ iti, sārūpyaṃ245 kiṃ bhavati ?
GSP28prakp06u:619: tathāpi dhārāvāhikajñānaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ uttarasya uttarasya vedyaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp06u:622: api ca nirākāratve saṃvidā pratikarmavyavasthā nānupapannā /
GSP28prakp06u:625: yat arthapratibaddhavyavahārānuguṇatayā prakāśate, tat tadarthasaṃvedanamiti vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28prakp06u:631: sarvasyaiva hi vastuno na upalambhamantareṇopalambha iṣyate /
GSP28prakp06u:637: tena tayorbhede 'pi sahopalambhaniyamo dṛṣṭo nābhedaṃ sādhayituṃ252kṣamaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:646: kintu saiveyaṃ jvāleti grahaṇasmaraṇarūpe dve pratītī vyavasthitaviṣaye darśayati /
GSP28prakp06u:647: iha tu bhedapratītiḥ pratyetavyādeva vyāvartanīyeti, na tadvirodhenānumānamutpadyate /
GSP28prakp06u:650: na hi tatra bhedo dṛśyate, kintvekasminneva candramasi netravṛttibhedena dve pratītī jāyete /
GSP28prakp06u:651: tayorindriyavṛttibhedādabhinne 'pi candramasyarthadvayaviṣayaṃ258 vyavahāraṃ vimūgaḥ pravartayantīti, tatra tatroktam /
GSP28prakp06u:660: prakāśe tu sati 261yad yathābhūtaṃ pratīyate, tat, tathābhūtamityabhyupagamo yuktaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:664: na ca sā bahirviṣayā na bhavati /
GSP28prakp06u:672: tena 266tāvatyevāṃśe tadadṛṣṭaṃ saṃskāramudbodhayati, yāvatyeva sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vopapadyate /
GSP28prakp06u:673: na cānubhūtāṃśasmaraṇe sukhaduḥkhodaya iti, na ca tatra saṃskārodbodhaḥ, nāpi smṛtiḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:674: ata eva ca gṛhītāṃśānavadhāraṇe 'nubhavamātramevāśiṣyata267 ityanubhavādhyavasāyo 'pi samarthitaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:679: na aprakāśātmakasyaiva prakāśādvyatiriktasya eṣa kāśa iti prakāśādeva siddham /
GSP28prakp06u:688: tathā tathāghaṭamānā vivicyante---śūnyā bhavanti--asadbhūtā bhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:689: pavañca te tāvadākārā asadbhūtāḥ prakāśātmāno na bhavantīti, kathaṃ prakāśante /
GSP28prakp06u:690: tathā grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittīnāṃ bhedo 'tyantāsadbhūtaḥ prakāśānanupraveśī kathaṃ prakāśeta ?
GSP28prakp06u:691: tathā 270prameyavimarśotthāstu bāhyārthāpahnavaprakārā jātinirṇaya eva prāyaśo vikalpya nirākṛtā iti,
GSP28prakp06u:693: ye punarjāgratpratyayānāṃ svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena pratyayatvādityanena hetunā bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ pratipādayanti,
GSP28prakp06u:697: tasmātsvayamprakāśatve 'pi saṃvido na bāhyagrāhyāpanhava iti sthitam /
GSP28prakp06u:702: tatra yadi karmakartṛtvānupapattirucyate, tato na kiñcidavahīyate /
GSP28prakp06u:716: 275 etena ye sukhādivanmānasapratyakṣaṃ jñānāntarameva jñānasadbhāve pramāṇamāhuḥ, te 'pi nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:719: nanu na tat saṃvidaḥ svayamprakāśāyā bhinnamupalabhyate /
GSP28prakp06u:726: yadā pramitiḥ pramāṇamiti bhāvasādhanamāśrīyate, tadā saṃvideva 279pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp06u:728: pramīyate 'neneti karaṇasādhane pramāṇaśabde ātmamanaḥsannikarṣādyātmano jñānasya pramāṇatve tadbalabhāvinī saṃvideva bāhyavyavahāropayoginīsatī phalam /
GSP28prakp06u:737: 281ye punaḥ pramāṇādabhinnaṃ phalamāhuḥ, te 'pi vādinaḥ kāryakāraṇyoraikyābhāvādevopekṣaṇīyāḥ /
GSP28prakp06u:738: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikanāthamiśraviracitāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ prakāṇapārāyaṇo prathamaḥ pratyakṣaparicchedaḥ samāptaḥ /
